text: 222px ' (June 24, 1661 – December 16, 1730) was a Japanese daimyō of the Edo period, who ruled the Tokushima Domain. His court title was Awa no kami. ==Family== * Father: Hachisuka Takanori (1642-1695) * Mother: Oshichi no Kata * Wives: ** Enhime ** Kahime * Concubines: ** Yokoyama-dono ** Fukura-dono ** Commoner * Children: ** Hachisuka Yoshitake (1692-1725) by Enhime ** Hachisuka Munekazu by Kahime ** Kotaro by Yokoyama-dono ** Hachisuka Takahiro (1694-1756) by Yokoyama-dono ** Ishimaru by Yokoyama-dono ** daughter by Fukura-dono ** Donosuke by Commoner ** Renkoin married Ii Naonobu by Commoner ** Hachigoro by Commoner ** Gengo by Commoner ** daughter married Ogasawara Tadasada by Commoner ** daughter married Okubo Tadaoki by Commoner ** daughter married Ando Nobutada by Commoner ==References== Category:1661 births Category:1730 deaths Category:Daimyo Category:Hachisuka clan
title: Hachisuka Tsunanori
